entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
